What is the purpose of the final keyword in Java?

column1: Which of the following statements correctly describes the role of the try-with-resources statement in Java?
column2: It automatically closes resources regardless of whether an exception occurs%true|It is used to handle exceptions that occur within a block of code%false|It is a way to declare and initialize local variables close to where they are used%false
